Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Tak tihle jsou opravdu nebezpeèní, jak tì spatøí, jdou po tobì.
Možná je pùjde jednoho po druhém vylákat do nìjaké pasti.
Asi bychom se mìli pomodlit k našemu ochránci.

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
These are really dangerous, as soon as they see you, they come after you.
Maybe it's possible to lure them one by one into some trap.
We should probably pray to our patron.
